title: S13 Ep34: Chosen: Chronicle of an Alien Abductee
itunes:title: Chosen: Chronicle of an Alien Abductee
description:
Today BEYOND the DARKNESS has been Chosen to share the Chronicle of an Alien Abductee with Byron Lacy.

Can you imagine the helplessness and fear that a five-year-old would feel when he's first visited by extraterrestrials? How about the look on his parents' faces when he confesses his alien encounter?

Chosen: Chronicles of an Alien Abductee is Byron W. Lacy's firsthand account of what modern science insists is only folklore.

Get the book here: www.Amazon.com/shop/darknessradio

Visit his site here: http://www.byronlacy.com/

save 20% off of an annual membership for the DDP YOGA NOW app and all DVD packs. Just go to ddpyoga.com/BEYOND to get started
